ADD_AUDIO_TO_LOCAL_LIBRARY: Thêm nhạc vào thư viện cục bộ
ADD_LANGUAGE_SUBTITLE: Trợ giúp Namida dịch thêm ngôn ngữ riêng
ADD_MORE_FROM_THIS_ALBUM: Bổ sung thêm từ Album sang hàng đợi
ADD_MORE_FROM_THIS_ARTIST: Bổ sung thêm từ Nghệ sĩ sang hàng đợi
ADD_MORE_FROM_THIS_FOLDER: Bổ sung thêm từ thư mục
ADD_MORE_FROM_TO_QUEUE: Bổ sung thêm nội dụng khác từ _MEDIA_ sang hàng đợi
ADVANCED_SETTINGS_SUBTITLE: Cài đặt nâng cao , đừng chạm vào.
ALBUM_THUMBNAIL_SIZE_IN_LIST: Kích thước hình thu nhỏ của Album
ALBUM_TILE_CUSTOMIZATION: Tùy chỉnh tiêu đề của Album
ANIMATING_THUMBNAIL_INTENSITY: Hiệu ứng chuyển động hoạt ảnh hình thu nhỏ
ANIMATING_THUMBNAIL_INVERSED_SUBTITLE: Thiết lập ở mức cao sẽ khiến hình thu nhỏ nhỏ hơn
ANOTHER_PROCESS_IS_RUNNING: Có tiến trình khác đang hoạt động.
AUTOMATIC_BACKUP_SUBTITLE: Tự động áp dụng tệp sao lưu gần đây nhất được tìm thấy bên trong vị trí sao lưu
AUTO_COLORING_SUBTITLE: Tự động chọn màu dựa trên bìa nhạc đang mở
AUTO_EXTRACT_TAGS_FROM_FILENAME: Tự động trích xuất từ tên tập tin
AUTO_EXTRACT_TITLE_AND_ARTIST_FROM_VIDEO: Tự động trích xuất Tiêu đề và tên Nghệ sĩ từ tiêu đề Video
BACKUP_AND_RESTORE_SUBTITLE: Sao lưu cơ sở dữ liệu và cài đặt.
BORDER_RADIUS_MULTIPLIER: Thiết lập nhân bán kính đường viền
CLEAR_IMAGE_CACHE: Xoá bộ nhớ đệm hình ảnh
CLEAR_IMAGE_CACHE_WARNING: Cảnh báo: sẽ dẫn đến việc thư viện không có hình ảnh. Chỉ sử dụng để xây dựng lại bộ nhớ đệm hình ảnh.
CLEAR_VIDEO_CACHE_NOTE: Bạn có thể chọn nội dung cần xoá.
COLOR_PALETTE_NOTE_1: Nhấn và giữ một màu để loại bỏ
COLOR_PALETTE_NOTE_2: Chạm vào hỗn hợp để sử dụng màu mặc định
CORRUPTED_FILE: Không thể phân tích tập tin , có thể nó đã bị hỏng
COULDNT_OPEN_YT_LINK: Không có sẵn liên kết Youtube cho bài hát này
COULDNT_RENAME_PLAYLIST: Không thể đổi tên danh sách phát
CREATED_BACKUP_SUCCESSFULLY_SUB: Tập tin sao lưu đã được tạo thanh công
CROSSFADE_TRIGGER_SECONDS: Trigger Crossfade automatically in the last _SECONDS_ seconds
CUSTOMIZATIONS_SUBTITLE: Customize how your player looks, make it yours
DEFAULT_COLOR_SUBTITLE: Set a color to be used by the player
DIM_MINIPLAYER_AFTER_SECONDS: Dim miniplayer after _SECONDS_ seconds of inactivity
DISPLAY_ALBUM_CARD_TOP_RIGHT_DATE_SUBTIT: Display Album date at Album Card top right
DISPLAY_REMAINING_DURATION_INSTEAD_OF_TO: Display remaining duration instead of total
DISPLAY_THIRD_ITEM_IN_ROW_IN_TRACK_TILE: Display Third Item in each Row
DISPLAY_TRACK_NUMBER_IN_ALBUM_PAGE: Display Track number in Album Page
DISPLAY_TRACK_NUMBER_IN_ALBUM_PAGE_SUBTI: Display a small box containing the track number in the album page
DOWNLOADS_METADATA_TAGS_SUBTITLE: Extract artist, title & album from video info by default
EMPTY_NON_MEANINGFUL_TAG_FIELDS: you have fields with empty/non-meaningful values, make sure you really want to edit them
ENABLE_BOTTOM_NAV_BAR_SUBTITLE: Items are inside the drawer bothways
ENABLE_CLIPBOARD_MONITORING_SUBTITLE: Allows pasting links and texts inside searchbar on the go
ENABLE_M3U_SYNC_NOTE_1: M3U Sync allows saving playlist changes to the original M3U file
ENABLE_M3U_SYNC_NOTE_2: If anything went wrong, a backup of this playlist will be found in _PLAYLISTS_BACKUP_PATH_
ENABLE_M3U_SYNC_SUBTITLE: If Denied, all changes done in this playlist will be lost on restart
ENABLE_SEARCH_CLEANUP_SUBTITLE: All Symbols and Spaces will be ignored
EXTRACT_FEAT_ARTIST_SUBTITLE: Extracts (feat. X) and (ft. X) artists, as a new artist entry.
EXTRAS_SUBTITLE: Extra Settings to fine your experience
FILTERED_BY_SIZE_AND_DURATION: Tracks Filtered by size and duration
FILTER_TRACKS_BY: Filter Tracks in Search Lists By
FORCE_MINIPLAYER_FOLLOW_TRACK_COLORS: Force miniplayer to follow track colors
FORCE_SQUARED_THUMBNAIL_NOTE: Thumbnail Size & Tile Height are NOT equal, Square-ish look will not be as expected, Do you wish to make them equal?
FORCE_STOP_COLOR_PALETTE_GENERATION: Force stop extracting color palettes? you can still continue it later
GENERATE_FROM_DATES_SUBTITLE: Generate tracks you listened to in a time range
HISTORY_IMPORT_MISSING_ENTRIES_NOTE: These entries couldn't be found inside library, if you believe they exist, please consider adding them manually
HISTORY_LISTENS_REPLACE_WARNING: _LISTENS_COUNT_ listens for _OLD_TRACK_INFO_ will be replaced with _NEW_TRACK_INFO_, confirm?
IGNORE_BATTERY_OPTIMIZATIONS_SUBTITLE: Downloads can be throttled when the app is battery restricted
IMMERSIVE_MODE_SUBTITLE: Hide Status & Navigation bars while Miniplayer is expanded
IMPORT_LAST_FM_HISTORY_GUIDE:
1. Go to _LASTFM_CSV_LINK_

2. Type your username, fetch and download csv file.

3. Choose the file from the next screen.
IMPORT_YOUTUBE_HISTORY_GUIDE:
1. Go to _TAKEOUT_LINK_

2. Press "Multiple Formats" and beside "History" choose "JSON".

3. Press "All Youtube data included", Deselect All and choose history only.

4. Create Export, Download & Unzip.

5. Choose "watch-history.json" from the next screen.
INDEXER_NOTE: Note: Incomplete Number of Artworks refers to the duplicated & not found Artworks
INDEX_REFRESH_REQUIRED: Do a Refresh after changing this
INFINITY_QUEUE_ON_NEXT_PREV_SUBTITLE: pressing next while playing the last item will jump to first, and vice versa
JUMP_TO_FIRST_TRACK_AFTER_QUEUE_FINISH: Jump to first track after finishing queue
KEEP_SCREEN_AWAKE_MINIPLAYER_EXPANDED_AN: Miniplayer is Expanded and a Video is Playing
LIBRARY_TABS_REORDER: You can reorder the activated tabs.
MATCH_ALL_TRACKS_NOTE: this can have an impact on the matching speed, as it will check all tracks in your library
MINIMUM_ONE_FOLDER_SUBTITLE: There should be at least 1 folder, add more folders if you want to remove this one
MIN_TRACK_DURATION_TO_RESTORE_LAST_POSIT: Minimum track duration to restore last played position
MIN_VALUE_CANT_BE_MORE_THAN_MAX: Minimum value can't be more than the maximum
MULTIPLE_TRACKS_TAGS_EDIT_NOTE:
You are about to edit these tracks,
Unchanged fields remains untouched.
NAME: Name
NEW_TRACKS_MOODS_SUBTITLE: Generate tracks based on available moods
NEW_TRACKS_RANDOM_SUBTITLE: Pick up random tracks from your library
NEW_TRACKS_RATINGS_SUBTITLE: Generate tracks that has specific rating
NEW_TRACKS_RECOMMENDED_SUBTITLE: Generate tracks you usually listened to with _CURRENT_TRACK_
NEW_TRACKS_SIMILARR_RELEASE_DATE_SUBTITL: Generate tracks that were released around the same time as _CURRENT_TRACK_
NO_EXCLUDED_FOLDERS: You Don't have any excluded folders
NO_TRACKS_FOUND_BETWEEN_DATES: This timerange doesn't have any tracks.
NO_TRACKS_FOUND_IN_DIRECTORY: No tracks found in this directory
NO_TRACKS_IN_HISTORY: You don't have enough tracks in history.
OLD_DIRECTORY_STILL_HAS_TRACKS: Old Directory still have some tracks, confirm?
OVERRIDE_OLD_FILES_IN_THE_SAME_FOLDER: Override old files in the same folder
PLAYBACK_SETTING_SUBTITLE: Can be accessed directly in the player by long pressing the audio button
PLEASE_ENTER_A_DIFFERENT_NAME:
This name already exists :(
please try another fancy name
PLEASE_ENTER_A_LINK_SUBTITLE: umm.. is this a youtube link?
PREVENT_DUPLICATED_TRACKS_SUBTITLE: Uses filename to uniqely identify tracks
PROMPT_INDEXING_REFRESH: _NEW_FILES_ new files has been found & _DELETED_FILES_ was deleted or filtered, wanna do a refresh?
PROMPT_TO_CHANGE_TRACK_PATH: Usually this happens when u delete/move/rename the file outside namida, Would you like to update current path?
REFRESH_LIBRARY_SUBTITLE: Check for newly added or deleted music
REPLACE_ALL_LISTENS_WITH_ANOTHER_TRACK: Replace all listens with another track
REQUIRES_CLEARING_IMAGE_CACHE_AND_RE_IND: Requires clearing image cache and re indexing
RESTORED_BACKUP_SUCCESSFULLY_SUB: Backup file has been restored successfully
RESUME_IF_WAS_INTERRUPTED: Resume if was paused by interruption
RESUME_IF_WAS_PAUSED_BY_VOLUME: Resume if was paused by volume
RE_INDEX_SUBTITLE: Rebuild your music library from scratch
RE_INDEX_WARNING:
This process might take a while, depending on your library size.

Artworks will not get re-indexed as long as they still exist
SEEK_DURATION_INFO: You can tap on current duration to seek backwards & total duration to seek forwards
SEPARATORS_BLACKLIST_SUBTITLE: These words will not get split
SEPARATORS_MESSAGE: No need to insert spaces, unless you wanna use a letter/symbol that can be found in a whole word (like x and ft.)
SET_FILE_LAST_MODIFIED_AS_VIDEO_UPLOAD_D: Set file last modified as video upload date
SET_MOODS_SUBTITLE: Use commas (,) to separate between them
SHOULD_DUCK_NOTE: Indicates that the volume should be lowered. ex: notification
SHOULD_PAUSE_NOTE: Indicates that the playback should be paused. ex: calls
STATS_SUBTITLE: Here are some info about your library
STORAGE_PERMISSION_DENIED_SUBTITLE: Please allow access to be able to perform this action
THEME_SETTINGS_SUBTITLE: The overall vibe of your player
TITLE: Title
TRACK_PATH_OLD_NEW:
Old name: "_OLD_NAME_"

New name: "_NEW_NAME_"

Are you sure?
USE_MEDIA_STORE_SUBTITLE:
✓ instant indexing time
x respect .nomedia will be forcely enabled
x some metadata tags will be missing
x youtube integration for local library will not work
USE_PITCH_BLACK_SUBTITLE: Useful for AMOLED screens.. and looks cooler
VIDEO_PLAYBACK_SOURCE_AUTO_SUBTITLE: This will give priority to local videos, if not found then it will fetch from youtube
VIDEO_PLAYBACK_SOURCE_LOCAL_EXAMPLE_SUBT:
Alan Walker - Faded.m4a
Video Alan Walker - Faded (480p).mp4
VIDEO_PLAYBACK_SOURCE_LOCAL_SUBTITLE: Checks if any video file (found inside the choosen folders list) has a filename that contains the filename of the track
VIDEO_PLAYBACK_SOURCE_YOUTUBE_SUBTITLE: Checks in track's filename & comment for any matching youtube link, videos are cached for later use.
VIDEO_QUALITY_SUBTITLE: Highest quality available will be picked.
VIDEO_QUALITY_SUBTITLE_NOTE: It's always good to keep more alternatives in case a quality isn't found, otherwise it will fallback to the worst quality
WEBM_NO_EDIT_TAGS_SUPPORT: WEBM format doesn't support tag editing
YT_PREFER_NEW_COMMENTS_SUBTITLE: Cached version will only be used when there is no connection
